title: Dr.A.Sowmya, KPR Institute Engineering and Technology, Autonomous Engineering Institution, Coimbatore, India
paragraphs: Certified with all eight modules of NITTT on September 2023; NPTEL 1% Topper with Elite+Silver Certification on September 2023, TALG Course; NPTEL 1% Topper with Elite+Gold Certification on September 2022; NPTEL 2% Topper with Elite +Silver Certification on September 2021; Participated in various FDPs and Training Programs; Completed Certificate Course in Yoga (with 80% in Theory subjects and 90% in Practicals) from The Gandhigram Rural Institute- Deemed University during Jun 2011 to Nov 2011

M.Sc. Chemistry (2009) and Ph.D in Chemistry (2014) from The Gandhigram Rural Institute, Tamil Nadu;  Post Doctoral Fellow (One Year; 2015-16)/Research Associate (Five Years;2016-21) at Department of Chemical Engineering, SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Kattankulathur during June 2015 - June 2021

Awarded Research Fellowship in Science for Meritorious Students (5 years) by University Grants Commission-Basic Scientific Research, New Delhi (2009-2014); Presented papers in 50 International/National Conferences including Technical Talk; Published Patent; Won best paper Awards in conferences; Serving as Reviewer for Reputed Journals
Life Member of Indian Desalination Association (InDA) - LM 484; Life Member of Asian Polymer Association - L 741; Life Member of Materials Research Society of India (MRSI) - LMB3831
